content.en: Hydrological machine learning: Machine learning models have been found to improve predictions of hydrological low-flow indices in ungaged basins, outperforming baseline models. Satellite-based hydro-climate variables integrated with machine learning techniques have shown comparable performance to process-based modeling in streamflow modeling at various scale watersheds. Hybrid machine learning models have demonstrated higher accuracy in predicting nutrient concentrations and identifying hydrological transport pathways of surface water nutrients.
content.da: Hydrologisk maskinlæring: Maskinlæringsmodeller har vist sig at forbedre forudsigelser af hydrologiske lavstrømsindekser i uundersøgte bassiner og overgå baseline-modeller. Satellitbaserede hydro-klimatiske variable integreret med maskinlæringsteknikker har vist tilsvarende præstation som procesbaseret modellering i strømningmodellering på forskellige skala-oplande. Hybride maskinlæringsmodeller har demonstreret højere nøjagtighed i forudsigelsen af næringsstofkoncentrationer og identificeringen af hydrologiske transportveje for næringsstoffer i overfladevand.
